name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick Save for Instagram (reel, photo, story)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access Instagram videos, stories, and photos in their original, high quality, and full size.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When browsing Instagram and looking to share a photo or video with friends, QuickSave is a helpful tool.

Here's what it can do:
- Save Instagram videos, photos, stories, and reels directly to your PC.
- Share Instagram content without watermarks.
- Switch between Desktop and Phone views.

How to use it:
Start by adding QuickSave to your browser. Visit the extension store, search for QuickSave, and click 'Install' or 'Add to Browser'.

Downloading photos and videos:
When you're on an Instagram page, you'll notice two new buttons under each post: 'Download' and 'Repost'. Simply click 'Download' under a photo or video to save it.

Saving Instagram Stories:
To save an Instagram Story, click on it. You'll find a 'Download' button at the top right corner of the story. Click this to save the story.

Sharing Instagram content:
To repost a photo, video, or story, click 'Repost'. Keep in mind that reposting someone else's Instagram story adds it to your own, and a post goes onto your feed. Always respect copyright and seek permission when sharing content on Instagram.

Limits on content sharing:
When sharing Instagram videos and photos, remember:

- Videos should not exceed 60 seconds in duration.
- File size must be under 4GB.
- Content must adhere to specific dimensions: 16:9 for widescreen, 1:1 for square, and 4:5 for vertical.
- Images must meet minimum resolutions: 600x315 for widescreen, 600x600 for square, and 600x750 for vertical on Instagram.

Following these steps will ensure you use QuickSave effectively. Always respect the creators' rights when downloading and sharing content.
